full_summary:
### EE517-240226 - Dismantling of Aquaculture Sites at Cap-Haldimand, Gaspé Bay, Gaspésie

#### Tender Information
Document Reference: WS4030009231-Doc4030038932
Request for Proposal (RFP) Number: WS4030009231

#### Project Details

* The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of services for the dismantling of aquaculture sites at Cap-Haldimand, Gaspé Bay, Gaspésie.
* The proposed services include the dismantling of aquaculture infrastructure, equipment, and debris related to the project.
* The RFP is issued pursuant to the trade agreements and procurement policies of the Government of Canada.

#### Contract Information

* Tender Status: Expired
* Tender Closing Date: June 28, 2023, at 14:00 hours (Eastern Daylight Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 3, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: None

#### Procurement Information
The RFP is being issued under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and will be governed by the Federal Crown’s procurement policies. The procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding.

#### Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact: Gabriel Fortin-Harvey, [gabriel.fortin-harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gabriel.fortin-harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
